weka.core.converters
Class ODFSaver

java.lang.Object
  weka.core.converters.AbstractSaver
      weka.core.converters.AbstractFileSaver
          weka.core.converters.ODFSaver
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, CapabilitiesHandler, BatchConverter, FileSourcedConverter, Saver, EnvironmentHandler, OptionHandler, RevisionHandler
public class ODFSaver
extends AbstractFileSaver
implements BatchConverter

Writes to a destination that is in ODF spreadsheet format.
For instance for spreadsheets that can be read with OpenOffice.org.

Valid options are: 

 -M <str>
  The string representing a missing value.
  (default: ?)
 -i <the input file>
  The input file
 -o <the output file>
  The output file

For a tutorial on ODFDOM, see:
http://www.langintro.com/odfdom_tutorials/create_ods.html

Version:
$Revision: 8109 $
Author:
FracPete (fracpete at waikato dot ac dot nz)
See Also:
Saver, Serialized Form
